attributes.action: Visa Extension for International Students in UK due to Covid 19.
attributes.additional_details:
All International Students currently enrolled at Universities having visa ending in 2021 should get an extension on their visa due to disruption of activities due to corona virus in the country. 

International students invested a lot and they should be given opportunity by extending their stay here. They want a proper British education with a hope finding good jobs at the end of their term.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
